meanings.definition: The practice of living on top of a pillar as a form of religious asceticism.
meanings.sent1: Stylitism involves extreme dedication to religious beliefs by living atop a pillar.
meanings.sent2: In ancient times, stylitism was a way for devout individuals to show their commitment to their faith.
meanings.sent3: Imagine the conversations one could have while practicing stylitism on a pillar!
meanings.sent4: Her commitment to stylitism was as unwavering as the pillar beneath her feet.
meanings.sent5: The image of a lone figure practicing stylitism on a tall pillar is etched in my mind.

meanings.definition: The architectural style characterized by the use of columns or pillars.
meanings.sent1: The grandeur of the building was enhanced by the stylitism of its design.
meanings.sent2: Stylitism in architecture often symbolizes strength and support.
meanings.sent3: The house stood out in the neighborhood due to its unique stylitism.
meanings.sent4: The stylitism of the structure gave it a timeless and majestic appearance.
meanings.sent5: The museum's stylitism reminded visitors of ancient Greek temples.
